primary

Class SearchAndMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • primary.SearchAndMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SearchAndMove
extends java.lang.Thread
    Algorithm to move the robot when it did not detect any blocks. Move in a square fashion until blocks are found. Notice: the entire algorithm is subject to drastic change after demo. This is only the prototype.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Dongwen Wang, Erik-Olivier Riendeau, 2016

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void activatedDetectObject()
      Activate detect object if the robot detects any objects and pause current thread
      private double pathSetter(double x, double y)
      Searching helper method: determine the heading of the robot, depending on its position lead the robot on a set searching path, which goes to each diagonal corners.
      static void pauseThread()
      Pause the thread by deactivating the inner loop
      static void resumeThread()
      Resume the thread by re-activating the inner loop
      void run()
      Runnable instance of the search and move.
      private boolean scanning()
      Scanning method: scan the environment for obstacles depending on where the robot is on the map returns a boolean which indicates if an object has been detected in the scanning process
      private double[] scanningDataProcessing(double[] position)
      Scanner helper method: process the scanned data, check if there has been a closer object scanned and outputs the position of previous object or new object
      static void stopThread()
      Terminates everything in the run by stopping the outer loop

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runnable instance of the search and move. Can be paused with pauseThread or stopped with stopThread. The algorithm cannot feature navigation methods or any methods that take time to complete because if it is paused or stopped, the effect needs to be immediate. TODO: what does he mean... cannot use this method without navigation
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • scanning

        private boolean scanning()
        Scanning method: scan the environment for obstacles depending on where the robot is on the map returns a boolean which indicates if an object has been detected in the scanning process

      • scanningDataProcessing

        private double[] scanningDataProcessing(double[] position)
        Scanner helper method: process the scanned data, check if there has been a closer object scanned and outputs the position of previous object or new object

      • pathSetter

        private double pathSetter(double x,
                double y)
        Searching helper method: determine the heading of the robot, depending on its position lead the robot on a set searching path, which goes to each diagonal corners. This path is set to help the robot cover the most area with the least traveling

      • pauseThread

        public static void pauseThread()
        Pause the thread by deactivating the inner loop

      • resumeThread

        public static void resumeThread()
        Resume the thread by re-activating the inner loop

      • stopThread

        public static void stopThread()
        Terminates everything in the run by stopping the outer loop

      • activatedDetectObject

        public static void activatedDetectObject()
        Activate detect object if the robot detects any objects and pause current thread
